Initializer# init(_:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
init<T>(_ source: T) where T : BinaryFloatingPoint
```

## [See Also](/documentation/swift/int/init(_:)-6gt9z#see-also)

### [Converting Floating-Point Values](/documentation/swift/int/init(_:)-6gt9z#Converting-Floating-Point-Values)

[`init(Double)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(_:)-8vbwo)Creates an integer from the given floating-point value, rounding toward zero.[`init(Float)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(_:)-2oscb)Creates an integer from the given floating-point value, rounding toward zero.[`init(Float16)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(_:)-3huv0)Creates an integer from the given floating-point value, rounding toward zero.[`init(Float80)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(_:)-66i0w)Creates an integer from the given floating-point value, rounding toward zero.[`init(CGFloat)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(_:)-5q6q5)
